name: Gluttony or Frugality
description:
Quick Controls:
Up, Down, Left, Right Arrows - Keyboard

Quick Mechanics: 

Eat Healthy FoodsReplenishes Energy Eat Unhealthy FoodsDiminishes Energy
Increases Slow/SlugDrink WaterRemoves Slow/Slug
Get Hit by SlimesYou DieJump over SlimesThey Die

Quick Reference:

As the game progresses, difficulty increases

Level 1Distance Level: 1000Level 2Distance Level: 2000Level 3Distance Level: 3000

===============================================================
The player must eat healthy foods while avoiding unhealthy foods. But watch out!! There are slimy snot enemies along the way. 

You walk, you get tired, you walk slower, then you die? Try beating this game and see if you are healthy enough.

===============================================================
This is a fun edited version for our final project requirement in the subject course: IECMPTK (Computational Thinking).
